unnormalised: Arrey yaar, statistics is giving me such headache! Like, what's the probability of me actually understanding Bayes' theorem? Maybe 0.0001%! And don't even get me started on standard deviation… my marks are deviating so much from the mean, it's practically a national disaster. I'm pretty sure my chances of winning the lottery (1 in 292.2 million) are higher than passing this exam. Seriously, if I see another normal distribution curve, I'm gonna faint, boss!
normalised: Are yaar, statistics is giving me such headache! Like, what's the probability of me actually understanding Bayes' theorem? Maybe zero point zero zero zero one percent! And don't even get me started on standard deviation… my marks are deviating so much from the mean, it's practically a national disaster. I'm pretty sure my chances of winning the lottery (one in two hundred and ninety two point two million) are higher than passing this exam. Seriously, if I see another normal distribution curve, I'm gonna faint, boss!
